snippet: An assessment of the NYPD’s crime reporting and CompStat auditing processes produced by the Crime Reporting Review Committee established by Police Commissioner Raymond W. Kelly. Published 2013.
lead_paragraph: An assessment of the NYPD’s crime reporting and CompStat auditing processes produced by the Crime Reporting Review Committee established by Police Commissioner Raymond W. Kelly. Published 2013.

headline.main: The Report of the Crime Reporting Review Committee
